name: Crafty Candy
description:
Play Crafty Candy, a MAGICAL MATCH 3 PUZZLE ADVENTURE loved by over 5 million players!

Swap, match, and collect candy to solve fun match 3 puzzles and explore a magical world of sugary treats. Help Candice the Witch craft powerful new spells and outsmart her sneaky sister Trixie in fun magic battles!

Adventure through thousands of unique and challenging puzzles and discover 5 spellbinding game modes! Play with friends to see who can get the highest score and compete in special time-limited events every day!

Crafty Candy is free to download and FREE TO PLAY! Join in the fun today!

- Enjoy thousands of tasty levels, magical surprises, and free daily rewards!

- Craft powerful boosters by mixing magical potions in Candice’s cauldron!

- Fill your wardrobe with sweet new outfits for Candice the Witch and her adorable cat Cookie!

- Outwit Trixie the sneaky witch in fun magical match 3 battles!

- Earn rewards and sweet prizes with time-limited events!

Invite your Facebook Friends and share an adventure filled with soda and sweet candy!

Craving something sweet? Enjoy all the candy, cookies, cake, and juicy fruit you desire in Crafty Candy, a magical match 3 adventure!

Check out how much our players love our beautiful puzzle adventure:

“Love this matching game and you get to make potions!! It is a really fun game to play!” – Karen L.

“Best puzzle game EVER. Almost at level 700 and still going strong!” – Chris J.

“This is a great match 3game. I haven't stopped playing it since I downloaded it!” – Willette W.

“The most amazing matching game ever.” – Traci M.

“Lovely game! The witch is awesome! I love strawberry blast levels!” – Mo M.
